message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. We're excited to discuss the details with you. As a starting point, we're willing to offer you the product for $800,000. We believe this is a competitive price considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $800,000 feels quite low considering the product's value. I'm willing to offer you $1,000,000. This price reflects the significant benefit the product will bring to my business, and I believe it's a fair compromise.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, we're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $950,000. We believe this price still reflects the value the product brings to your business, and we're open to further discussions.
